title: BRIEF-Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Says LoI Signed With Cairo & Doutcher
text:
BRIEF-Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Says LoI Signed With Cairo & Doutcher

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 10:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Says LoI Signed With Cairo & Doutcher Oct 8 (Reuters) - Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Ltd : * LETTER OF INTENT SIGNED WITH CAIRO & DOUTCHER TO EXPLORE RZTO DISTRIBUTION OPPORTUNITIES IN ITALY * CAIRO & DOUTCHER TO PAY FOR INITIAL RZTO DEMONSTRATION SYSTEM WITH OPTION FOR A FUTURE DISTRIBUTION DEAL

BRIEF-Roots Sustainable Agricultural Technologies Says LoI Signed With Cairo & Doutcher
